title: Waka Waka World - Safari-Themed Indoor Playground
description: Waka Waka is a Safari-themed indoor playground for children from 7 months to 12 years old. Located at Annex@Furama, Waka Waka has ample amount of space for little ones to unleash their energy. Waka Waka helps enhance various developmental skills through fun physical activity. From giant wave slides to challenging obstacle courses, Waka Waka is an adventure that guarantees a play experience like no other. There’s also a bistro and lounge area for the parents to kickback and relax while the children run wild. What’re you waiting for? Come on down for a roarin’ good time today!

title: Waka Waka World Adventure for Developmental Skills
blurb: Enhance skills through fun physical activity at Waka Waka.
description: Waka Waka enhances developmental skills through physical activity. Enjoy giant wave slides and obstacle courses for a unique play experience. Parents can relax in the bistro and lounge area while children play. Unlimited playtime on weekdays. Pre-book a 1h 45min timeslot for weekend play sessions. Waka Waka is an adventure that guarantees a play experience like no other. There’s also a bistro and lounge area for the parents to kickback and relax while the children run wild.
datetime_display: Unlimited playtime on weekdays, 1h 45min timeslot for weekend

title: Play @ Wakawaka
blurb: Play venue for families and kids.
description: Play @ Wakawaka is a play venue designed for families and kids. It offers various play areas and activities suitable for children of different ages. The venue aims to provide a fun and engaging environment where kids can play, learn, and explore. It features play structures, interactive games, and dedicated spaces for different activities. Play @ Wakawaka is a great place for families to spend quality time together and create lasting memories. The venue is designed to be family-friendly, ensuring a safe and enjoyable experience for everyone. It is suitable for families with young children looking for a fun and engaging play experience.

title: Play @ Wakaka - Indoor Playground and Party Venue
blurb: Indoor playground and party venue for kids and families.
description: Play @ Wakaka is an indoor playground and party venue designed for kids and families to have fun and create lasting memories. We offer a safe and engaging environment with a variety of play areas and activities suitable for different age groups. Our facilities include slides, climbing structures, ball pits, and interactive games. We also host birthday parties and other special events, providing customized packages to meet your needs. Our goal is to provide a fun and memorable experience for all our guests. We strive to create a welcoming atmosphere where children can explore, learn, and play together.

title: Play at Waka Waka
blurb: Jungle-themed indoor playground for kids and families.
description: Play at Waka Waka is an indoor playground designed with a jungle theme, offering various play areas and activities for children of different ages. It features climbing structures, slides, obstacle courses, and interactive games to keep kids entertained. The playground aims to provide a safe and engaging environment where children can develop their physical and social skills through play. Waka Waka is suitable for families with young children looking for a fun and active outing.

title: Play @ Waka Waka: Indoor Adventure Playground
blurb: An indoor playground with thrilling climbing structures.
description: Play @ Waka Waka is an indoor adventure playground designed to provide a fun and engaging experience for children and families. The playground features a variety of climbing structures, obstacles, and play areas that encourage physical activity and imaginative play. Kids can explore different zones, challenge themselves with climbing walls, and enjoy interactive games. The facility is designed to be safe and family-friendly, with comfortable seating areas for parents to relax while their children play. It's an ideal destination for birthday parties, family outings, and playdates, offering a memorable and active experience for all ages. Waka Waka provides a unique blend of adventure and entertainment, making it a popular choice for families seeking a fun and active day out.

title: Waka Waka Safari - Indoor Playground Adventure
blurb: An indoor playground with a safari theme!
description: Waka Waka is an indoor playground with a safari theme that provides a safe and fun environment for children to explore and play. It features a variety of play areas, including slides, climbing structures, and a ball pit. Waka Waka is designed to promote physical activity, social interaction, and cognitive development in children. It is suitable for children of all ages and abilities. Parents can relax and enjoy the comfortable seating area while their children play. Waka Waka also offers birthday party packages and other special events.
